text: thanks Jon! this is good feedback when planning for 2019 :slightly_smiling_face: keep the thoughts coming!
The macros are essentially snippets/templates if you have responses you use frequently. Definitely can do a better job sharing that info, though!

Happy Friday! This user is looking to customize their blog template to group posts together by month and year: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Content-Design-Questions/Grouping-blog-posts-by-year/m-p/219915>. If anyone has any thoughts, tips or tricks to share  it would be greatly appreciated! :slightly_smiling_face:
